name: Papo & Yo
notes: The installer won't work if the install path contain spaces.

files.papo-game: N/A: Select the ".sh" install file downloaded from humblebundle.com

content:
exe: PapoYo.sh
files:
- papo-game: 'N/A: Select the ".sh" install file downloaded from humblebundle.com'
installer:
- execute:
    args: -- --destination=$GAMEDIR
    file: papo-game
